thread.title: Virat Kohli is unbelievable, feels Amol Muzumdar
thread.title_full: Virat Kohli is unbelievable, feels Amol Muzumdar

title: Virat Kohli is unbelievable, feels Amol Muzumdar
text: Virat Kohli is unbelievable, feels Amol Muzumdar Saturday, 24 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) India needed a miraculous performance to keep their series hopes alive. Being Chennai, MS Dhoni had to call it right at the toss and he did. No team has won chasing a target in this series and Dhoni & Co just followed the trend. They needed runs on the board and who better than Virat Kohli to cater to that need. Cometh the hour, ...
